name: Future Island
desc: A replica of site from the festival Future Island/rockWerchter, This was an assignment early in my first year where we learned how to use click event and event-listeners in JavaScript

name: Ailiv
desc: A rebuild of the offical Ailiv website, making use of self-made JSON-files, visual shopping cart, and URL Parameters for detail pages. Made with JavaScript

name: She Code Afrika
desc: A alternative version of the She Code Afrika website using html and CSS

name: A Digital Agency
desc: A Digital agency website made using eleventy, sass, nunjucks, some JavaScript & learning to work together in 1 github repo with multiple people

name: A light Digital Agency
desc: A Lighter version of a Digital Agency website made using html & CSS

name: My walking app
desc: A walking app made with eleventy and nunJucks, this was my first assignment with eleventy, sass and nunjucks

name: Gentse Feesten
desc: A rebuild of the official Gentse Feesten website, includes URL parameters for filtering, a lot of vanilla JavaScript

name: Arne Quinze
desc: A rebuild of the official Arne Quinze website, includes filtering and use of api's in JavaScript and special CSS methods

name: Github User Database
desc: A github userbase created with vanilla JavaScript, includes the github api to search for users, see their repective branches, repo's etc. also includes the youtube Api allowing you to search for youtube videos, see channels etc..

name: A mailchimp survey result
desc: A mailchimp survey result for IT-Buss created with Eleventy , nunjucks and Sass

name: A Developer Quiz
desc: A Developer quiz made with in JavaScript with a WIP quiz API.

name: A WIP social app made in PHP
desc: A social app made with php and MySql databases, this was my first real website with php, including user management, posts, comments, like, friends/followers

name: Wikimedia
desc: A movie app made in ReactJS, using the 'themoviedb' API, reusable components, search function, Firebase implementation, account management, pagination and more.

name: Diorama
desc: A diorama made in blender and later converted to a website using reactJS + ThreeJs, WIP animations.
